definition: to exceed the speed limit/to speed/high-speed
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: Video records of the police for speeding electronic detection method for radar detection methods.
sentences.chinese: 视频记录超速电子警察的检测方式为雷达检测方式。

sentences.english: Brazil chose drink-driving reduction and speed management.
sentences.chinese: 巴西选择了减少酒后驾驶和超速管理。

sentences.english: Cooper reprimanded his daughter for driving too fast and getting a speeding ticket.
sentences.chinese: 库珀责备女儿开车太快，以致收到超速转户罚单。

sentences.english: Have you ever been stopped for speeding?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有因超超速曾被人拦截？

sentences.english: With the car, if left behind is not the speed chase.
sentences.chinese: 而跟车，万一掉队了也不要超速追赶。

sentences.english: Clutch and overspeed provision during autorotation .
sentences.chinese: 离合器和超速期间提供自转。

sentences.english: Speeding on city streets is penalized.
sentences.chinese: 在城市街道超速行驶应受到处罚。

sentences.english: The constable stopped a speeding driver.
sentences.chinese: 警察拦住了一个超速行驶的司机。

sentences.english: Use cruise control and overdrive gear.
sentences.chinese: 使用定速控制和超速档。

sentences.english: He was booked on a charge of speeding.
sentences.chinese: 他因超速行车被警方记录在案。

sentences.english: Oversee the introduction of additional red-light and speed enforcement camera systems.
sentences.chinese: 监督加设冲红灯及超速摄影机系统的计划。

sentences.english: The speed limiter is to limit the installation of the elevator car speeding down devices.
sentences.chinese: 而限速器是限制电梯轿厢超速下行的安装装置。

sentences.english: Some young people are hot dogs behind the wheel, speeding all the time.
sentences.chinese: 一些年轻人开车时，常作些超速的惊险动作。

sentences.english: Research shows that speeding uses more gas.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，超速行驶耗更多的油。

sentences.english: He was held for overspeed driving.
sentences.chinese: 他因超速驾驶而遭拘留。
他们因超速行驶而受到罚款。
